page_title: Master of Engineering (Robotics and Mechatronics Engineering) - Apply
text: How to applyHelpful step-by-step how to apply guides, including everything you need to submit an application to RMIT - from entry requirements to the documentation you'll need to complete your application to selection tasks and more.FeesDiscover fee information for programs and courses at RMIT University, including full-fee and Commonwealth supported places for postgraduate students, FEE-HELP loans and payment options.ScholarshipsAchieve your study goals with a scholarship. Each year scholarships are awarded to thousands of new and continuing students across RMIT study areas.
